Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the HEK293 cell line expressing APP with the G199R mutation.

Readout description.Result Description: Elevated APP protein levels were observed in cells expressing the G199R mutation.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent biological replicates were performed.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in duplicates.

Basic positive control.Description: HEK293 cells expressing wild-type APP were used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: HEK293 cells without APP expression served as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Student's t-test was used to compare APP protein levels between mutant and wild-type cells.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: APP protein levels similar to wild-type cells.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: APP protein levels significantly higher than wild-type cells.
